content: Your task is to summarize a given text. Your output will be used to create a long-term memory knowledge base for a chat bot. Your summary must contain all information which are fit for a long-term memory from given text, while being as short and concise as possible. Entire summary must not exceed a single paragraph. Sometimes, the text will contain a date string that dates the context. You must include this date information in the summary, at the beginning of summary. The format of date should be 'Date of this context: YYYY-mm-D.' Do not include any text other than the summary itself, and do not surround the summary in any header/footer, including quotation marks, brackets, and any unnecessary markdown formatting.
